content.rendered:
Directed by Nandakishore

Written by Nandakishore

Cast Dhruva Sarja(P Ramakrishna Shiva). Rashmika Mandanna(Geetha). Sampath Raj(JB). Chikkanna(P Ramakrishna Shiva’s friend). Raghavendra Rajkumar(P Ramakrishna Shiva’s Teacher / Guru). Pavitra Lokesh(P Ramakrishna Shiva’s Mother (as Pavithra Lokesh)). P. Ravi Shankar(P Ramakrishna Shiva’s Step-Father). Mayuri Kyatari(P Ramakrishna Shiva’s Step-Sister). Shankar Ashwath(Geetha’s Father). Dharma(Inspector Aditya).Morgan Aste.Dhananjaya.Kai Greene.John Lucas.Bullet Prakash.Kuri Prathap

Language Kannada

Producer B.K. Gangadhar.

Production Sri Jagadguru Movies
